imdb.plot outline: A competition series featuring 12 aspiring bounty hunters who risk life and limb to chase down actual fugitives for their first time. Spike ordered 10 episodes of the series, which eliminates those who don't catch the most fugitives. The ultimate winner will win a position with a prominent bail bond and fugitive recovery agency.
imdb.title: Full Bounty
plot: A competition series featuring 12 aspiring bounty hunters who risk life and limb to chase down actual fugitives for their first time. Spike ordered 10 episodes of the series, which eliminates those who don't catch the most fugitives. The ultimate winner will win a position with a prominent bail bond and fugitive recovery agency.::Spike TV
